372810.name: Echo Tokyo - Wallpapers
372810.description:
This DLC pack contains a selection of artwork in wallpaper format showcasing images from the game and development:

  • Echo Tokyo Phoenix logo art
  • Core Officer wallpaper art
  • Original Shizume Design art
  • Phoenix poster WIP art
  • Phoenix poster final wallpaper
  • Echo Tokyo map art wallpaper
  • Young Shizume Design art
  • Young Shizume Wallpaper art

The pack also includes the Shizume Large Daki image, in super high resolution 9000x2888 pixels.

See the images for example of all the images included in this package.
When purchased and downloaded a new folder will appear in the base game folder in steamapps with the wallpapers artwork and the daki art inside.
